meanings.definition: The act of using dynamite to explode or demolish something.
meanings.sent1: The dynamiting of the old building created a loud boom.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used dynamiting to clear the area for the new road.
meanings.sent3: The dynamiting of the birthday cake with candles was a surprising way to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: The dynamiting of the enemy's defenses allowed the troops to advance quickly.
meanings.sent5: The dynamiting of the dam unleashed a powerful force of water.

meanings.definition: The practice of using dynamite as a method of fishing.
meanings.sent1: The dynamiting of fish in the river was a controversial fishing technique.
meanings.sent2: Some fishermen resort to dynamiting to catch a large number of fish at once.
meanings.sent3: The dynamiting of the pond caused quite a splash among the fish community.
meanings.sent4: The dynamiting of the lake with explosives was an extreme way to fish.
meanings.sent5: The dynamiting of the ocean floor stunned the marine life in the area.
